scripts.build: rm -r production & npm run compile-css && npm run copy-all
scripts.css-beautify: cd production/bt9fs3/css && node-sass --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --output-style expanded style.css style.css
scripts.copy-all: npm run php && npm run project && npm run root && npm run svg
scripts.compile-css: npm run run-sass && npm run css-beautify
scripts.php: cp -r source/php production/bt9fs3 && cd production/bt9fs3 && mv php/page/* ./ && rm -r php/page
scripts.root: cp -r source/.htaccess production/bt9fs3 && cd production/bt9fs3 && mv php/index.php ./index.php
